channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump administration’s use of troops to help with immigration raids faces test in court
item.description: President Donald Trump’s use of troops to help carry out intensified immigration raids faces its biggest challenge yet on Thursday.

item.title: Supreme Court revives lawsuit from Atlanta family whose home was wrongly raided by the FBI
Harvard researcher charged with smuggling frog embryos is released from federal custody on bail
